“Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of righteousness will triumph over evil.” 
−Flora

name: Sword of Truth
action: <mark>FINAL ENCHANTMENT</mark> Banish this item − Banish chosen Villain character.
flavour: Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.

name: Ariel
title: Whoseit Collector
action: <mark>LOOK AT THIS STUFF</mark> Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.
flavour: “You want thingamabobs? I got twenty.”

name: Aurora
title: Briar Rose
action: <mark>DISTURBING BEAUTY</mark> When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 ※ for the rest of the turn.
flavour:
“There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . .”
− Prince Phillip

name: Aurora
title: Dreaming Guardian
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
Protective Embrace Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavour: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.

name: Aurora
title: Regal Princess
flavour: „They say if you dream a thing more than once, it‘s sure to come true!“

name: Belle
title: Inventive Engineer
action: <mark>TINKER</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
flavour: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.

name: Belle
title: Strange but Special
action:
READ A BOOK During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
MY FAVOURITE PART! While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 ◆.
flavour: “Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise . . .”

name: Chief Tui
title: Respected Leader
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
flavour: “You can always rely on the strength of those who love you.”

name: Donald Duck
title: Strutting His Stuff
action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: Walk smarter, not harder.

name: Flounder
title: Voice of Reason
flavour: „Excitment... adventure... danger lurking around every cor- AAAAAGGH!“

name: Gramma Tala
title: Storyteller
action: <mark>I WILL BE WITH YOU</mark> When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour:
Moana: “Is there something you want to tell me?”
Gramma Tala: “Is there something you want to hear?”

name: Hades
title: Infernal Schemer
action: <mark>IS THERE A DOWNSIDE TO THIS?</mark> When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.
flavour: “He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness.”

name: Jasmine
title: Disguised
flavour: “Try to understand. I've never done a thing on my own. I've never had any real friends. . . . I've never even been outside the palace walls.”

name: Jasmine
title: Queen of Agrabah
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
CARETAKER When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

name: Maleficent
title: Sinister Visitor
flavour: „The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel...“

name: Maleficent
title: Uninvited
flavour: She had no invitation−and needed no introduction.

name: Maurice
title: World-Famous Inventor
action:
GIVE IT A TRY Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
IT WORKS! Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

name: Merlin
title: Self-Appointed Mentor
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
flavour: “What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it.”

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Detective
action: <mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

name: Mufasa
title: King of the Pride Lands
flavour: “A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size.”

name: Philoctetes
title: Trainer of Heroes
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
flavour: “Ya gotta be the best to train the best. And I train the best!”

name: Robin Hood
title: Unrivaled Archer
action:
Feed The Poor When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
Good Shot During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavour: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

name: Scar
title: Mastermind
action: <mark>Insidious plot</mark> When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 ※ this turn.
flavour: "The best plans involve a little danger. Just not for me."

name: Tamatoa
title: So Shiny!
action:
WHAT HAVE WE HERE? When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.
GLAM This character gets +1 ◆ for each item you have in play.
flavour: “Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!”

name: Triton
title: The Sea King
flavour: “Isn't ‘Because I said so’ enough of a reason?”

name: Develop Your Brain
action: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.
flavour:
„Knowledge, wisdom−there‘s the real power!“
−Merlin

name: If It's Not Baroque
action: Return an item card from your discard to your hand.
flavour: “. . . Don't fix it.”

name: Let It Go
action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour:
It's time to see what I can do
To test the limits and break through

name: One Jump Ahead
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat -
Tell you all about it when I got the time

name: Work Together
action: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour:
Pacha: “Put your whole back into it!” 
Kuzco: “This is my whole back!”

name: Coconut Basket
action: <mark>CONSIDER THE COCONUT</mark> Whenever you play a character,you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavour: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything - including baskets to carry more coconuts.

name: Eye of the Fates
action: <mark>SEE THE FUTURE</mark> ↷ − Chosen character gets +1 ◆ this turn.
flavour: You can change the future once you know what you're looking at.

name: Fishbone Quill
action: <mark>GO AHEAD AND SIGN</mark> ↷ − Put any card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
flavour:
“If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet, you've got to pay the toll.” 
−Ursula

name: Magic Golden Flower
action: <mark>HEALING POLLEN</mark> Banish this item - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.
flavour:
“Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from the heavens. . . .” 
−Flynn Rider

name: Scepter Of Arendelle
action: COMMAND ↷ − Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

name: Aladdin
title: Cornered Swordsman
flavour:
“Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!” 
−Razoul

name: Beast
title: Hardheaded
action: <mark>DESTRUCTION</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen item card.
flavour: "She will never se me as anything... but a monster"

name: Captain Hook
title: Captain of the Jolly Roger
action: <mark>DOUBLE THE POWDER!</mark> When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.
flavour: “A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We’ll pot ’em like sitting ducks.”

name: Captain Hook
title: Forceful Duelist
action: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character get +2 ※.)
flavour: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

name: Captain Hook
title: Thinking a Happy Thought
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 ※.)
STOLEN DUST Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

name: Cerberus
title: Three-Headed Dog
flavour: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting over the ball.

name: Donald Duck
title: Musketeer
action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STAY ALERT! During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Gantu
title: Galactic Federation Captain
action: <mark>Under arrest</mark> Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.
flavour: "Relax, enjoy the trip... and don't get any ideas!"

name: Goons
title: Maleficent's Underlings
flavour: They may seem useless, but they came with the castle.

name: Hans
title: Thirteenth in Line
action: <mark>STAGE LITTLE ACCIDENT</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavour: Tired of being last, he decided to cut the line.

name: Hercules
title: True Hero
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavour: „You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic.“

name: Kristoff
title: Official Ice Master
flavour:
Kristoff: "You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living."
Anna: "Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really - ah, mm. That's unfortunate."

name: Kronk
title: Right-Hand Man
flavour: “Oh yeah. It's all coming together!”

name: Lilo
title: Galactic Hero
flavour: “Space. That's where aliens come from. And also tourists!”

name: Maui
title: Demigod

title: Musketeer
action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 ※.

Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 ※.)

title: Rightful Heir
action: <mark>I KNOW WHAT I HAVE TO DO</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 1 lore.

name: Starkey
title: Hook's Henchman
action: <mark>AYE AYE, CAPTAIN</mark> While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +1 ◆.
flavour: A pirate must be tough, loyal, and strong. “Smart” doesn't even make the list.

title: Heartless
action: <mark>SEEK THE HEART</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.

Moana: “No. Have you?”

action: Banish chosen item.

action: Deal 2 damage to chosen character.

fuse!“

action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)

We don't like
what we don't understand
In fact, it scares us

action: <mark>SHOW ME</mark> ↷, 3 ⬡ - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.
